title: Flight Simulator 2020 - POI's - French Guyana - Dreyfus Tower
description:
In this video we will fly over Dreyfus Tower. Kourou, located on the mainland where the Kourou River flows into the Atlantic, was once the home of the ‚ÄúKourou Prison,‚Äù part of the infamous Devil‚Äôs Island prison system. After the prison closed in the mid-1900s, most of the buildings were demolished to make room for the H√¥tel des Roches. Among the remnants of the old facilities, the most noteworthy is the Dreyfus Tower, a small structure that resembles the leaning tower of Pisa, standing where the river meets the ocean. The original purpose of the tower was to communicate with the islands via the semaphore flag system in the days before radio. Remnants of the prison bakery also remain nearby.
